item.title: Acceptance
item.description: Self Link: Acceptance Acceptance means being open to your thoughts, feelings, and circumstances as they are. It doesn’t mean approving, wanting, liking, or giving in.

item.title: Cargo
item.description: Self Link: Cargo Cargo is Rust’s build system and package manager. Cargo handles the following - Building code. Downloading libraries. Build libraries/dependencies.
